#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#define in cin
#define out cout
using namespace std;
const int Nmax = 100001;
int v[Nmax];
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    ifstream in("test.in");
    ofstream out("test.out");
    #endif
    int n,k;
    in>>n>>k;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) in>>v[i];
    sort(v+1,v+n+1);
    out<<v[k]<<'\n';
    return 0;
}
